select
distinct
from psc_type
order by ${orderByClause}

psc_type = #{record.pscType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rcv_wareh_reqd = #{record.rcvWarehReqd,jdbcType=CHAR},

where psc_type = #{pscType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT psc_type as optionValue , description as optionName FROM psc_type WHERE psc_type!=''
mapper.sql: pt.psc_type, pt.description, pt.rcv_wareh_reqd, pt.puc_auto_gen, pt.puc_auto_chk, pt.is_pu_itmd, pt.is_pu_itmd_alt, pt.deliv_wareh_reqd, pt.slc_auto_gen, pt.slc_auto_chk, pt.is_sl_itmd, pt.is_sl_itmd_alt, pt.tran_unit_reqd, pt.dr_diff_jgd, pt.dr_diff_jgd_alt, pt.impl_by_ins, pt.impl_by_ins_alt, pt.multi_impl, pt.multi_impl_alt, pt.is_spot, pt.is_spot_alt, pt.prc_site, pt.prc_site_alt, pt.fixed_unit_price, pt.rqd_ctrl, pt.rqd_ctrl_alt, pt.spl_enabled, pt.spl_enabled_alt, pt.exbl_rate, pt.is_cms, pt.is_cms_alt, pt.ps_stl_mthd, pt.ps_stl_mthd_alt, pt.mfz_enabled, pt.mfz_enabled_alt, pt.ps_mfz_site, pt.ps_mfz_site_alt, pt.dpst_rate, pt.gm_enabled, pt.gm_enabled_alt, pt.gm_rate, pt.plan_ctrl, pt.plan_ctrl_alt, pt.bxi_enabled, pt.bxi_enabled_alt, pt.prod_cat_id
mapper.select:
select pc.prod_cat_name as prodCatName,
from psc_type pt left join prod_cat pc on pc.prod_cat_id = pt.prod_cat_id where 1=1
and pt.psc_type like CONCAT('%',#{pscType}, '%')
and pt.description like CONCAT('%', #{description}, '%')
